blog.models module

class blog.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This class is used to post a blog.

param str title:

The Title of the Blog

param str slug:

Description of blog used in web address

param str content:

The content of the post

param date update_on:

The last time changes were made to the blog

param date created_on:

The date the first instance of the blog was created

param boolean status:

Is the blog posted or still in draft

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

img_url()[source]

Returns a url that points to the image for the blog where image has the same name as the slug of the blog
